verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Moreover he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what תִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> that thou findest אֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> eat אֱכוֹל֙ <S%H398><s%> eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4039><s%> this roll הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go דַּבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאֶפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> So I opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֑י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth וַיַּ֣אֲכִלֵ֔נִי <S%H398><s%> and he caused me to eat אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַמְּגִלָּ֥ה <S%H4039><s%> that roll הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> He

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man בִּטְנְךָ֤ <S%H990><s%> cause thy belly תַֽאֲכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> to eat וּמֵעֶ֣יךָ <S%H4578><s%> thy bowels תְמַלֵּ֔א <S%H4390><s%> and fill אֵ֚ת <S%H854><s%> for הַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4039><s%> with this roll הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> that I give אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וָאֹ֣כְלָ֔ה <S%H398><s%> thee Then did I eat וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> [it] and it was in my mouth כִּדְבַ֥שׁ <S%H1706><s%> as honey לְמָתֽוֹק׃ <S%H4966><s%> for sweetness פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> along בֹּא֙ <S%H935><s%> get אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> thee unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H1696><s%> and speak בִדְבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> with my words אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> to a people עִמְקֵ֥י <S%H6012><s%> of a strange שָׂפָ֛ה <S%H8193><s%> speech וְכִבְדֵ֥י <S%H3515><s%> and of an hard לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> language אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁל֑וּחַ <S%H7971><s%> For thou [art] not sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> [but] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> Not to many עִמְקֵ֤י <S%H6012><s%> of a strange שָׂפָה֙ <S%H8193><s%> speech וְכִבְדֵ֣י <S%H3515><s%> and of an hard לָשׁ֔וֹן <S%H3956><s%> language אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> thou canst not understand דִּבְרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1697><s%> whose words אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁלַחְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H7971><s%> Surely had I sent הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יִשְׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> thee to them they would have hearkened אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> But the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יֹאבוּ֙ <S%H14><s%> will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since אֵינָ֥ם <S%H369><s%> are not אֹבִ֖ים <S%H14><s%> unto thee for they will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Surely כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto me for all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חִזְקֵי־ <S%H2389><s%> harder מֵ֥צַח <S%H4696><s%> brow וּקְשֵׁי־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> care for הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Behold I have made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֛יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face חֲזָקִ֖ים <S%H2389><s%> strong לְעֻמַּ֣ת <S%H5980><s%> against פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְחֲךָ֥ <S%H4696><s%> and thy forehead חָזָ֖ק <S%H2389><s%> strong לְעֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> against מִצְחָֽם׃ <S%H4696><s%> their foreheads

כְּשָׁמִ֛יר <S%H8068><s%> As an adamant חָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> harder מִצֹּ֖ר <S%H6864><s%> than flint נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> have I made מִצְחֶ֑ךָ <S%H4696><s%> thy forehead לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Do תִירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> fear אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵחַ֣ת <S%H2865><s%> them not neither be dismayed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> at their looks כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> though בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like פ

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Moreover he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> all my words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that I shall speak אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> unto thee receive בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart וּבְאָזְנֶ֥יךָ <S%H241><s%> with thine ears שְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> and hear

וְלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go בֹּ֤א <S%H935><s%> get אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגּוֹלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> thee to them of the captivity אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children עַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> unto them and tell אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> whether יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> whether they will hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or יֶחְדָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H2308><s%> or whether they will forbear

וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <S%H5375><s%> took me up ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Then the spirit וָאֶשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> and I heard אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> behind ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> me a voice רַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> rushing גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of a great בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> [saying] Blessed כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> [be] the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> from his place

וְק֣וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> [I heard] also the noise כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> of the wings הַחַיּ֗וֹת <S%H2416><s%> of the living creatures מַשִּׁיקוֹת֙ <S%H5401><s%> that touched אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H269><s%> another וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the noise הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> of the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <S%H5980><s%> over against וְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> them and a noise רַ֥עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> rushing גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> of a great

וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> So the spirit נְשָׂאַ֖תְנִי <S%H5375><s%> lifted me up וַתִּקָּחֵ֑נִי <S%H3947><s%> and took me away וָאֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went מַר֙ <S%H4751><s%> in bitterness בַּחֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> in the heat רוּחִ֔י <S%H7307><s%> of my spirit וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> but the hand יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and חָזָֽקָה׃ <S%H2388><s%> was strong

וָאָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> Then I came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> beside הַגּוֹלָ֜ה <S%H1473><s%> to them of the captivity תֵּ֣ל אָ֠בִיב <S%H8512><s%> at Telabib הַיֹּשְׁבִ֤ים <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> beside נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָר֙ <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar [וָאֲשֶׁר כ] (וָֽאֵשֵׁ֔ב <S%H834><s%> after ק) הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and I יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> and I sat שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וָאֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> where they sat שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> where שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> them seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days מַשְׁמִ֥ים <S%H8074><s%> there astonished בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> And it came to pass at the end שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> of seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days פ וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man צֹפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I have made לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <S%H8085><s%> therefore hear מִפִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <S%H2094><s%> and give them warning אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <S%H559><s%> When I say לָֽרָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> out הִזְהַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H2094><s%> and thou givest him not warning וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or דִבַּ֛רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> nor speakest לְהַזְהִ֥יר <S%H2094><s%> to warn רָשָׁ֛ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרְשָׁעָ֖ה <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked לְחַיֹּת֑וֹ <S%H2421><s%> to save his life ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> that רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> the same wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> will I require

וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> Yet כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if הִזְהַ֣רְתָּ <S%H2094><s%> Yet if thou warn רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> and he turn מֵֽרִשְׁע֔וֹ <S%H7562><s%> not from his wickedness וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרְשָׁעָ֑ה <S%H7563><s%> nor from his wicked ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> but thou hast delivered ס

וּבְשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> [man] doth turn צַדִּ֤יק <S%H6662><s%> When a righteous מִצִּדְקוֹ֙ <S%H6664><s%> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and commit עָ֔וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and I lay מִכְשׁ֛וֹל <S%H4383><s%> a stumblingblock לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> before ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> him he shall die כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִזְהַרְתּוֹ֙ <S%H2094><s%> because thou hast not given him warning בְּחַטָּאת֣וֹ <S%H2403><s%> in his sin יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> he shall die וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכַ֗רְןָ <S%H2142><s%> shall not be remembered צִדְקֹתָו֙ <S%H6666><s%> and his righteousness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which he hath done וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> will I require

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> However כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> if הִזְהַרְתּ֣וֹ <S%H2094><s%> Nevertheless if thou warn צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> should not חֲטֹ֛א <S%H2398><s%> sin צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> [man] that the righteous וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not חָטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> not and he doth not sin חָי֤וֹ <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶה֙ <S%H2421><s%> live כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> because he is warned וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> also thou hast delivered ס

וָאָקוּם֮ <S%H6965><s%> Then I arose וָאֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> and went forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַבִּקְעָה֒ <S%H1237><s%> into the plain וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and behold the glory יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹמֵ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> stood כַּכָּב֕וֹד <S%H3519><s%> there as the glory אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> which I saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and I fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> on my face
